Class MainController

Object
MainController
public class MainController extends Object
Controller for main menu operations. CONTROLLER LAYER: Coordinates between Model and View for main menu. - Handles routing logic for login/registration - Coordinates View and AuthController - Does NOT print to console (View's responsibility) - Does NOT contain business logic (Model/AuthController's responsibility)

  • Method Details

    • handleMainMenu

      public boolean handleMainMenu()
      Main controller method that handles main menu flow. CONTROLLER: Handles routing, calls AuthController, tells View what to display.

    • handleLogin

      private void handleLogin()
      Handles login flow. CONTROLLER: Gets input from View, calls AuthController, routes based on result.

    • handleStudentMenu

      private void handleStudentMenu(User user)
      Handles student menu loop. CONTROLLER: Delegates to StudentController.

    • handleCompanyRepMenu

      private void handleCompanyRepMenu(User user)
      Handles company representative menu loop. CONTROLLER: Delegates to CompanyRepController.

    • handleCareerStaffMenu

      private void handleCareerStaffMenu(User user)
      Handles career staff menu loop. CONTROLLER: Delegates to CareerStaffController.

    • handleRegisterCompanyRep

      private void handleRegisterCompanyRep()
      Handles company representative registration. CONTROLLER: Gets input from View, calls AuthController, displays result via View.
